Build-Depends: libkf6baloo-dev, cmake (>= 3.1.0~), debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-sequence-qmldeps, dh-sequence-kf6, extra-cmake-modules (>= 5.75.0~), gettext, libkirigami-dev, libkf6archive-dev, libkf6attica-dev, libkf6auth-dev, libkf6codecs-dev, libkf6completion-dev, libkf6config-dev, libkf6coreaddons-dev, libkf6crash-dev, libkf6declarative-dev, libkf6guiaddons-dev, libkf6i18n-dev, libkf6iconthemes-dev, libkf6itemviews-dev, libkf6jobwidgets-dev, libkf6kio-dev, libkf6newstuff-dev, libkf6package-dev, libkf6service-dev, libkf6solid-dev, libkf6widgetsaddons-dev, libkf6windowsystem-dev, kirigami-addons-dev, pkg-kde-tools (>= 0.15.16), qml6-module-org-kde-newstuff, qt6-base-dev, qt6-base-private-dev, qt6-declarative-dev, qt6-declarative-private-dev
Description: comic book reader Peruse was created as a way to make exactly that as easy and pleasant as possible, and to simply get out of the way and let you read your comic books.  One could say that it allows you to peruse your comic books at your leisure, but that would be a silly way of putting it - so, peruse your comic books at your leisure!
Package-List: peruse deb kde optional arch=any peruse-common deb kde optional arch=all
